select SC.sc_seq, SC.sc_stnum, ST.st_name sc_stname, ST.st_dept sc_stdept, ST.st_grade sc_stgrade, SC.sc_sbcode, SC.sc_score
from tbl_Score SC left join tbl_Student ST ON SC.sc_stnum = ST.st_num group by SC.sc_stnum;

select SC.sc_seq, SB.sb_name sc_sbcode, SC.sc_stnum
from tbl_Score SC left join tbl_Student ST ON SC.sc_stnum = ST.st_num left join tbl_subject SB on SC.sc_sbcode = SB.sb_code group by SC.sc_sbcode;
